rules_text:
Flying, vigilance
[i]Undergrowth[/i] – Tiest enters with X charge counters, where X is the number of creature cards in your graveyard.
{1}, Remove a charge counter from Tiest: Put a +1/+1 or a -1/-1 counter onto target creature.
[i]Morbid[/i] – At the beginning of each end step, if a creature died this turn, put a charge counter onto Tiest.
